title: How Honda's New Insurance Service Benefits Car Owners
description: While you might look to Honda or Acura to supply your next car, you can now also turn to them for auto insurance. Like an increasing number of automakers, Honda is getting into the auto insurance business with the launch of Honda Insurance Solutions in all 50 states. ...
titleSummary: "Driving Down Costs: Honda's Innovative Insurance Solution for Vehicle Owners"
descriptionSummary: Honda fans have a new reason to stick with the brand: comprehensive insurance coverage. In a move mirroring industry trends, Honda has introduced its own auto insurance program, Honda Insurance Solutions, available nationwide.

title: Volkswagen Won't Like The Hyundai Ioniq 5's Charging Speed
description: An EV's charging speed can tip the scales one way or the other, especially if you enjoy family road trips. While I may be cool with waiting half an hour for an electric crossover to charge on a weekend adventure, my kids, both of whom are under five years old, might feel differently. The Volkswagen ...
titleSummary: Hyundai's Electric Challenger Exposes VW's Charging Conundrum on Ioniq 5 Debut
descriptionSummary: For families embarking on frequent road trips, an electric vehicle's charging speed can be a crucial factor. Slow refueling may not sit well with young children, so speed is often a top priority. A speedy recharge from the Volkswagen ID.4 could make all the difference.

title: Mazda Drops Enticing 2025 Mazda3 Lease Offer For August
description: If you’re looking for a small, powerful car that’s surprisingly spacious, the Mazda3 might be exactly what you need. The iconic small car from Mazda comes in either hatchback or sedan form and doesn’t skimp on style. Available 18-inch black alloy wheels go with just about any paint color, and ...
titleSummary: "Mazda Tempts Buyers with Limited-Time Lease Deal on 2025 Mazda3"
descriptionSummary: Mazda's compact Mazda3 boasts a spacious interior despite its sleek design. Available in both hatchback and sedan styles, this stylish car won't sacrifice room for passengers or cargo, even on models with striking 18-inch black wheels.

title: Your EV Battery Is Spying on You: MIT Research Uncovers Hidden Location & Privacy Threats
description: Think your shiny new electric vehicle keeps your secrets safe? Think again. Researchers from MIT recently proved that the innocent-looking battery gauge on your dashboard can betray your personal details to anyone tech-savvy enough to look. Simply put, the way your EV uses power isn't just about ...
titleSummary: "Electric Cars Exposing Secret Lives: MIT Study Reveals Alarming Location Tracking Risks"
descriptionSummary: Don't assume your electric vehicle's secrets are safe behind its sleek design. A surprising vulnerability has been discovered: a seemingly innocuous dashboard feature can reveal intimate details about you to those with the right tech know-how.

title: Mazda Drops Impressive 2025 CX-70 Lease Offer for August
description: When it comes to full-size SUVs, the Mazda CX-70 ticks a lot of boxes for most buyers. title: Rimac Reveals Bugatti Tourbillon And Nevera Secrets As Testing Ramps Up
description: The Bugatti Tourbillon is deep into its development and testing phases, with numerous prototypes being tested in various conditions around the world. description: In 1987, German auto manufacturer and Porsche tuner RUF quickly became the darling of Porsche fans worldwide when it released the CTR, a machine better known by its other name: Yellowbird. title: Report: Toyota Still Considering Smaller Unibody Truck for US
description: Small trucks have had a bumpy history in the States. The small truck segment could grow even more with the Bezos-backed Slate ...

descriptionSummary: In recent years, American consumers have shown a surprising appetite for compact pickup trucks, as evidenced by the success of models like Ford's Maverick and Hyundai's Santa Cruz. Now, another contender is poised to enter the market.

title: One-of-25 Prodrive P25 Subaru Impreza for sale
description: When the Prodrive P25 debuted in 2022, its combination of iconic World Rally Championship (WRC) looks and up-to-date mechanical upgrades ensured that it sold out quickly even with a price tag of about $500,000. title: Vince McMahon Crashes Bentley Continental GT Speed Into BMW, Cited for Reckless Driving
description: According to police, McMahon was behind the wheel of a 2024 Bentley Continental GT Speed on July 24 when he collided with a BMW 430 on the Merritt Parkway in Westport, Connecticut. State troopers claim they were trying to stop McMahon for speeding when he rear-ended the BMW at reportedly 80–90 ...

title: 2019 Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 3ZR For Sale With Just 2,290 Miles

title: Automakers Bet on Performance EVs to Revive Slowing Demand

descriptionSummary: The global leader in automotive manufacturing is poised to enter the growing compact pickup segment, targeting enthusiasts and everyday drivers with a versatile new model set to debut sometime between 2026 and 2027.

title: This Rendering Imagines a Modern Version of Classic Porsche 911s
description: The Porsche 911 is an iconic sports car, but part of that legacy is due to the fact that, in 2025, it still looks strikingly similar to the first 911s from the early 1960s. descriptionSummary: The Porsche 911's enduring iconic status can be attributed in part to its remarkably consistent design language since the 1960s. Yet, despite its timeless look, modern models have grown significantly larger and heavier. Recent digital artistry has explored this intriguing contrast.

descriptionSummary: Discover a sporty yet practical full-size SUV that checks all the boxes: ample space, impressive performance, and an affordable price point. Meet the Mazda CX-90, a stylish and feature-rich vehicle designed for comfort and adventure.

title: One SoCal Fisker Dealer is Still In Business and Has Inventory
description: Fisker filed for bankruptcy last year and subsequently shut down, leaving owners with no parts, repair support, or warranty coverage. description: In the space of just a year or two, Hyundai has two fresh-faced, three-row, gas-powered crossovers on sale. title: Subaru Hikes Impreza Prices for 2026—Should You Wait or Buy The 2025 Instead?

title: New Car Shoppers Are Sacrificing These Features to Save Money
description: Automakers continue to add flashy and expensive features to their new vehicles. However, AutoPacific’s “Future Attribute Demand Study,” which surveyed ...
titleSummary: "Cutbacks on Wheels: Budget-Conscious Buyers Prioritize Affordability Over Luxury Perks"
descriptionSummary: Automakers are loading up new cars with premium amenities like expansive sunroofs and customizable dashboards, but do these features truly resonate with buyers? A recent survey sheds light on what drivers really want from their vehicles.

description: The Nissan Armada, known globally as the Nissan Patrol, has long been celebrated for its rugged capability and utilitarian strength. descriptionSummary: The Nissan Armada, a stalwart of rugged reliability, has built a reputation on versatility and unyielding durability. descriptionSummary: As hybrid models become more common, some automakers are adopting a shared naming strategy across their gas-guzzling and electric lineup, a trend exemplified by the Chevrolet Blazer's dual identities. This approach presents both benefits and drawbacks for consumers.

title: How did Cadillac Make the 2026 Lyriq Fit in the "V" Family?
description: The Cadillac Lyriq’s formula is almost perfect. It’s fast, nimble, tech-forward, stylish, and incredibly easy to become acquainted with. descriptionSummary: The Cadillac Lyriq strikes a remarkable balance between performance, innovation, and refinement. Its potent engine options, sleek design, and user-friendly tech features make it an appealing choice for those willing to invest in luxury, with prices starting at $60,090.
